price: Bishimira inema n’ingabire bivuye kwa Allah, kandi mu by’ukuri Allah ntaburizamo ibihembo by’abemera.
arabic: ۞ يَسۡتَبۡشِرُونَ بِنِعۡمَةٖ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَفَضۡلٖ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يُضِيعُ أَجۡرَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: yastabshirūna biniʿ'matin mina al-lahi wafaḍlin wa-anna al-laha lā yuḍīʿu ajra al-mu'minīna
